title: [5.0.12rc1] smb mount doesn't work - configured identical to working mount in 5.0.11
body:
expected behavior

mount to appear as folder

actual behavior

mount appears as a file

steps to reproduce

configured an smb mount in both 5.0.11 and 5.0.12rc1.  the configuration was identical:

5.0.11

![capture5_0_11](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5174383/1227203/60c1a9e0-278d-11e3-8a3c-6ef33c6cda3f.png)


5.0.12rc1

![capture5_0_12rc1](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5174383/1227206/692b905a-278d-11e3-9a8e-591064c2e872.png)



go to files page on both.  5.0.11 shows the mount as a folder which is accessible with files in it:

![capture5_0_11a](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5174383/1227215/8080a240-278d-11e3-835c-6fd51ae0719d.png)



5.0.11rc2 shows mount as a file -- indicating there is something incorrect with the configuration???  but, as you can see, config is the same in a working and a non-working scenario and we have a green light in the config as well


![capture5_0_12rc1a](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5174383/1227227/9df0f0a0-278d-11e3-806f-2d58d8508f34.png)




server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.21","versionstring":"5.0.12rc1","edition":"enterprise"}
linux ubuntu, php5.5.3
